title: Middle East: journey into the future
brief_description: Depicts the dual life style of Taufic, an Egyptian farmer who, in order to support his family, must leave his village for two weeks in every four and work four hundred miles away as adviser for an oil company. Notes the stresses of the constant change of his life style and the necessity of the work to help the Middle East move into the future.
